price: Nta gushidikanya ko ari bo bazaba abanyagihombo ku munsi w’imperuka.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
